text: Agriculture Museum exhibition hall The Agricultural Museum () is a museum about agriculture in Jasin Town, Jasin District, Melaka, Malaysia. ==History== The museum building was originally the first post office in Jasin Town. It was then converted into a museum and was opened to public in October 1990. ==Exhibitions== The museum displays the historical activities and the economy of the local Jasin people in the fields of agriculture. ==Opening time== The museum is open everyday from 9.00 a.m. to 5.00 p.m. {| class="wikitable" |+Ticket Price ! rowspan=2| Category ! colspan=2| Price |- ! MyKad ! Non Mykad |- | Adult | align=center| RM3 | align=center| RM5 |- | Children | align=center| RM2 | align=center| RM3 |} ==See also== * List of museums in Malaysia * List of tourist attractions in Melaka * Agriculture in Malaysia ==References== Category:1990 establishments in Malaysia Category:Museums established in 1990 Category:Museums in Malacca
title: Agricultural Museum (Malaysia)
